user: How can I secure my home Wi-Fi?

user: My internet is slow. What can I do?
bot: Step 1: Restart your modem and router. Step 2: Check if multiple devices are consuming bandwidth. Step 3: Run a speed test. Step 4: Contact your ISP if the problem persists.

user: How to reset network on iPhone?
bot: Go to Settings > General > Transfer or Reset iPhone > Reset > Reset Network Settings.

bot: Go to Settings > Network & Internet > Wi-Fi preferences > Enable 'Switch to mobile data automatically'.

category: OS-Specific Details (Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, iOS)
user: How to reset network on iPhone?
bot: Go to Settings > General > Transfer or Reset iPhone > Reset > Reset Network Settings.

user: How to prioritize Wi-Fi over mobile data on Android?
bot: Go to Settings > Network & Internet > Wi-Fi preferences > Enable 'Switch to mobile data automatically'.

category: Firewalls, IP Protection, and Anti-misuse Guidelines
user: What is a firewall?
bot: A firewall is a network security device that monitors and filters incoming and outgoing network traffic based on security rules.

user: Thanks for the help!
bot: You're welcome! If you need anything else, just give me a shout 😊

user: How can I secure my home Wi-Fi?
bot: Change the default admin credentials, use WPA3 encryption, hide your SSID, and regularly update your router's firmware.

user: What is DNS?
bot: DNS (Domain Name System) translates domain names like www.example.com into IP addresses so browsers can load internet resources.
